name: Golden Gate Bridge
description: A suspension bridge spanning the Golden Gate, the one-mile-wide strait connecting San Francisco Bay and the Pacific Ocean.

name: Alcatraz Island
description: A former prison located on an island in the San Francisco Bay, known for its infamous inmates.

name: Fisherman's Wharf
description: A popular tourist area in San Francisco, known for its seafood, shops, and attractions.

name: Palace of Fine Arts
description: A monumental structure in the Marina District, known for its classical architecture and tranquil lagoon.

name: Lombard Street
description: A famous crooked street in San Francisco, known for its steep, winding path and beautiful flowers.

name: Chinatown
description: The oldest Chinatown in North America, known for its vibrant culture, shops, and restaurants.

name: Coit Tower
description: A tower perched on Telegraph Hill, offering panoramic views of San Francisco and the Bay.

name: Pier 39
description: A popular shopping and dining destination in San Francisco, known for its sea lions and bay views.

name: National Mall
description: A national park in Washington, D.C., home to many monuments and museums.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: A symbolic monument located in New York Harbor, gifted by France.

name: Mount Rushmore
description: A monumental sculpture in the Black Hills of South Dakota, featuring four U.S. presidents.

name: Niagara Falls
description: A group of powerful waterfalls straddling the border between the United States and Canada.

name: Yellowstone National Park
description: The first national park in the world, known for its geothermal features and wildlife.

name: Times Square
description: A brightly illuminated commercial intersection in Midtown Manhattan, New York City.

name: Empire State Building
description: A iconic skyscraper in Midtown Manhattan, offering panoramic views of the city.

name: Rocky Mountain National Park
description: A national park in Colorado, featuring majestic mountain scenery and diverse wildlife.

name: Disneyland Park
description: A theme park in Anaheim, California, known as 'The Happiest Place on Earth.'

name: Space Needle
description: A iconic tower in Seattle, offering panoramic views of the city and the Puget Sound.

name: Great Wall of China
description: A series of fortifications made of stone, brick, tamped earth, wood, and other materials. It is one of the most iconic symbols of China and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Grand Canyon
description: A massive canyon in Arizona, carved by the Colorado River over millions of years. It is one of the most famous natural wonders of the world.

name: Forbidden City
description: The imperial palace complex in Beijing, China, known for its historical significance and stunning architecture.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: An iconic iron lattice tower in Paris, France, one of the most recognizable structures in the world.

name: Kyoto Temples
description: A collection of historic temples in Kyoto, Japan, known for their cultural and spiritual significance.

name: Santorini
description: A picturesque island in Greece, famous for its white-washed buildings, blue-domed churches, and stunning sunsets.

name: Mount Fuji
description: Japan's highest mountain, a symbol of the country and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Pyramids of Giza
description: Ancient Egyptian pyramids, including the Great Pyramid of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

name: Serengeti National Park
description: A world-renowned wildlife park in Tanzania, famous for its annual migration of wildebeest and zebras.

name: Machu Picchu
description: An ancient Incan city in Peru, perched high in the Andes, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Iguazu Falls
description: A stunning waterfall system on the border of Argentina and Brazil, one of the largest in the world.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: A world-famous performing arts venue in Sydney, Australia, known for its unique design.

name: Great Barrier Reef
description: The world's largest coral reef system, off the coast of Queensland, Australia, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Uluru
description: A massive sandstone monolith in the heart of Australia, a sacred site for the local Aboriginal people.

name: Table Mountain
description: A flat-topped mountain overlooking Cape Town, South Africa, offering stunning views and a cable car ride.

name: Victoria Falls
description: One of the largest and most famous waterfalls in the world, located on the Zambezi River between Zambia and Zimbabwe.
